Mod.name: Mould
Mod.description:
An expansion primarily based around hunting and exploration.
[b] This mod is (mostly) abandoned. However I may still add compatibilities between specific biome mods within this mod but probably not too many as it will become exponentially more work.[/b]
[h1] Current Features: [/h1] [list] [*] A 3rd Sun [*] 7 new spells and 7 returning spells [*] 31 weapons and wands [*] New biomes: Coral Reef (thanks to Spoopy), Cursed Sandcave, Prawn Cave [*] Tweaks to bosses and adding new drops [*] A structure to respawn bosses (only Alchemist, Dragon and Leviathan currently) [*] Archaeology to give incentives to hunting specific bosses [*] New materials and alchemy recipes [*] 1 new perk and 1 returning perk [/list]
[h1] Compatibility [/h1] Mould is now compatible with these mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2263080245] Noitavania by Tanksy [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2479652426] Flesh Biome by hornedkey [/url] (and you can use the biomes from all 3 at once) [b] To ensure that the mods load correctly, have them in this order: [/b] Mould Noitavania Flesh Biome
[b] Github: https://github.com/mole-den/mould_n [/b] [b] Discord: https://discord.gg/tgdN6kHZhy [/b]
[b] Special Thanks:[/b] Master of Copium, Gustavo, Extol, Evaisa, TheOneTheOnlySpoopyBoi
